The best of remedies for the worst of maladies, or, Spiritual receipts and antidotes for the preservation of a plague-sick, sinfull soul wherein is shown, sin is the cause and repentance the cure of the pestilence / seasonably published by a lover of peace and truth ..., R.A. R. A. (Richard Alleine), 1611-1681.
[2], 255 p.
[s.n.], London : 1667.
Attributed to Richard Alleine. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
=======
